member.name: SIP_SUBJECTINFO
member.summary: The SIP_SUBJECTINFO structure specifies subject information data to the subject interface package (SIP) APIs.

member.name: SIP_SUBJECTINFO.cbSize
member.summary: The size, in bytes, of this structure.

member.name: SIP_SUBJECTINFO.pgSubjectType
member.summary: A pointer to a GUID structure that identifies the subject type.

member.name: SIP_SUBJECTINFO.hFile
member.summary: A file handle that represents the subject. If the storage type of the subject is a file, set hFile to INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE and set the pwsFileName parameter to the name of the file.

member.name: SIP_SUBJECTINFO.pwsFileName
member.summary: A pointer to a null-terminated Unicode string that contains the file name of the subject.

member.name: SIP_SUBJECTINFO.pwsDisplayName
member.summary: A pointer to a null-terminated Unicode string that contains the display name of the subject.

member.name: SIP_SUBJECTINFO.dwReserved1
member.summary: This member is reserved for future use.

member.name: SIP_SUBJECTINFO.dwIntVersion
member.summary: This member is reserved. Do not modify this member. It is used by the SIP to pass the internal version number between get and verify functions.

member.name: SIP_SUBJECTINFO.hProv
member.summary: An HCRYPTPROV handle to the cryptography provider.

member.name: SIP_SUBJECTINFO.DigestAlgorithm
member.summary: A structure that contains the identifier for the hash algorithm used to hash the file.

member.name: SIP_SUBJECTINFO.dwFlags
member.summary: A value that modifies the behavior of the functions that use this structure. For more information about possible values for this member, see the dwFlags parameter of SignerSignEx.

member.name: SIP_SUBJECTINFO.dwEncodingType
member.summary: A value that specifies the encoding type used for the file. Currently, only X509_ASN_ENCODING and PKCS_7_ASN_ENCODING are being used; however, additional encoding types may be added in the future. For either current encoding type, use: X509_ASN_ENCODING | PKCS_7_ASN_ENCODING.

member.name: SIP_SUBJECTINFO.dwReserved2
member.summary: This member is reserved for future use.

member.name: SIP_SUBJECTINFO.fdwCAPISettings
member.summary: This member is not used.

member.name: SIP_SUBJECTINFO.fdwSecuritySettings
member.summary: This member is not used.

member.name: SIP_SUBJECTINFO.dwIndex
member.summary: The message index of the last call to CryptSIPGetSignedDataMsg. operation.

summary.para: Specifies the type of additional information provided.

listheader.description: There is no additional information about the subject.
The additional information is a flat file.
The additional information is a catalog member.
The additional information is a BLOB.
The additional information is in a user defined format.

member.name: SIP_SUBJECTINFO.psFlat
member.summary: An structure that contains additional information for flat file subject types.

member.name: SIP_SUBJECTINFO.psCatMember
member.summary: An structure that contains additional information for catalog member subject types.

member.name: SIP_SUBJECTINFO.psBlob
member.summary: An structure that contains additional information for BLOB subject types.

member.name: SIP_SUBJECTINFO.pClientData
member.summary: A pointer to SIP-specific data.
